content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To help you with your HVAC needs, may I please have your name?
I'm Carol. But I want the best service, and I don't want to wait long.
Thanks a lot, Carol. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm our service availability?
It's 789 Pine Street. Make sure it's within your area because I can't tolerate delays.
Let me verify if 789 Pine Street is within our service area.
Good news, Carol! Your address is within our service area. When would be the ideal time for our technician to visit?
Tomorrow morning, no later than 9 AM. And I want the price upfront. No hidden fees!
Thank you, Carol. I will check availability for tomorrow morning before 9 AM and also provide an estimated price for your HVAC service.
Our technician is available tomorrow morning before 9 AM. For a basic HVAC check, our price estimate is $120. Does this work for you?
$120? That's too high! I got a flyer saying $80 elsewhere. Can you match that? Otherwise, forget it.

I understand your concern about pricing, Carol. Unfortunately, we cannot match that price due to our high-quality service standards. Would you like to proceed with the $120 appointment for tomorrow morning?
No, thanks. I don't want to spend that much. Call me if you drop the price. Bye.
reason: customer declined due to price sensitivity
